challenge: Say one extra sentence after ordering coffee
Say one extra sentence after ordering food
Compliment a girl on her shoes
Compliment a girl on her tattoos
Contact a friend that you haven't talked to in a while
Ask for a discount for something
Answer the phone and don't let it ring

Have confidence like the guys from the Howard Stern show
Be Grateful for what I have
